steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the sample from the crucible.
2. If necessary, use a diamond grinding wheel to achieve the desired dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
3. Polish the surface with fine-grit sandpaper to remove any rough edges and improve appearance.
4. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to prevent oxidation if the sample will be exposed to air.
